elements.name: Verify that a DELETE request to `/api/visitorsPurposeDelete` with invalid authorization and `id` returns a
elements.description: 403 status code and a "You do not have authorization or token error" message in the response body.

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.
The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeDelete" path parameters.
The api user prepares a DELETE request to send to the api visitorsPurposeDelete endpoint containing the information 1278.
The api user sends a DELETE request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '403' with the reason phrase Forbidden.

name: As an administrator I should be able to delete the visitor puspose record in the system via API connection.
